{{Disambiguation}}
'''Remove''' may refer to:

== Control ==
*[[Q]], a control that removes item(s) from the [[inventory]] of a [[player]].

== Enchantment ==
*[[Curse of Vanishing]], an enchantment that makes items disappear upon the owner's [[death]].

== Commands ==
*{{cmd|clear}}, a command that removes all the items from the inventory of a player.
*{{cmd|effect}}, a command that can remove all the [[effect]]s of a player.
*{{cmd|item}}, a command that removes items by replacing them.{{only|java}}
*{{cmd|kill}}, a command that removes all the [[entities]] in a range.
*{{cmd|remove}}, the {{EE}} equivalent of {{cmd|kill|link=none}}.
*{{cmd|replaceitem}}, the {{BE}} equivalent of {{cmd|item|link=none}}.
